This LED light bar is a perfect off-road lighting solution, featuring a durable die-cast aluminum housing and unbreakable polycarbonate lens. With 120 watts of power, 12-inch length, and spot flood composite beam, it provides excellent illumination. IP67 rated waterproof and dustproof, shockproof design for long-lasting performance. Mounting brackets included for easy installation. Lifetime warranty for peace of mind. ECE and SAE approved for on-road and off-road use in North America and Europe. Comes with a wiring harness for plug-and-play installation. Ideal for trucks, SUVs, ATVs, UTVs, and boats. Trust the LED light bar leader for your lighting needs!
